updates.title: Week 1 Progress Report - Brody
updates.summary: Expirimenting with Figma sites for website design and deployment.
updates.content:
In Q3 we achieved a 12% year-on-year revenue increase, driven by stronger product adoption and improved retention. However, cost pressures from supply chain disruptions and inflationary inputs are beginning to tighten margins.

Highlights

  • Revenue up 12%
  • Gross margin narrowed by 1.5%
  • CapEx increased by 8%

Going forward, we plan to mitigate supply chain risk by diversifying suppliers and locking in pricing on key raw materials.

updates.title: Week 1 Progress Report - Jacob
updates.summary: Jacob's progress report that he needs to write.
updates.content:
We are excited to release the beta version of our AI-powered scanner tool. In this beta, users can enter a company ticker and receive a risk score with supporting highlights.

Features

  • Risk breakdown by categories (e.g. liquidity, governance, market)
  • Sentiment insights from MD&A text
  • Historical alerts and anomaly detection

Feedback is encouraged; we plan to iterate quickly and expand capabilities over the coming months.
